# The `MergedLoadStoreMotion.cpp` File Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This pass performs merges of loads and stores on both sides of a. <a href="#details">More...</a>

<Link id="l00001" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===- MergedLoadStoreMotion.cpp - merge and hoist/sink load/stores -------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Part of the LLVM Project, under the Apache License v2.0 with LLVM Exceptions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00004" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// See https://llvm.org/LICENSE.txt for license information.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0 WITH LLVM-exception</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="6"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//! \\file</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//! This pass performs merges of loads and stores on both sides of a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  diamond (hammock). It hoists the loads and sinks the stores.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The algorithm iteratively hoists two loads to the same address out of a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// diamond (hammock) and merges them into a single load in the header. Similar</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// it sinks and merges two stores to the tail block (footer). The algorithm</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// iterates over the instructions of one side of the diamond and attempts to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// find a matching load/store on the other side. New tail/footer block may be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// insterted if the tail/footer block has more predecessors (not only the two</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// predecessors that are forming the diamond). It hoists / sinks when it thinks</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// it safe to do so.  This optimization helps with eg. hiding load latencies,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// triggering if-conversion, and reducing static code size.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// NOTE: This code no longer performs load hoisting, it is subsumed by GVNHoist.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Example:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Diamond shaped code before merge:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//            header:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                     br %cond, label %if.then, label %if.else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                        +                    +</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                       +                      +</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                      +                        +</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//            if.then:                         if.else:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//               %lt = load %addr&#95;l               %le = load %addr&#95;l</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//               &lt;use %lt&gt;                        &lt;use %le&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//               &lt;...&gt;                            &lt;...&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//               store %st, %addr&#95;s               store %se, %addr&#95;s</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//               br label %if.end                 br label %if.end</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                     +                         +</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                      +                       +</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                       +                     +</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//            if.end (&quot;footer&quot;):</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                     &lt;...&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Diamond shaped code after merge:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//            header:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                     %l = load %addr&#95;l</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                     br %cond, label %if.then, label %if.else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                        +                    +</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                       +                      +</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                      +                        +</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//            if.then:                         if.else:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//               &lt;use %l&gt;                         &lt;use %l&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//               &lt;...&gt;                            &lt;...&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//               br label %if.end                 br label %if.end</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                      +                        +</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                       +                      +</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                        +                    +</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//            if.end (&quot;footer&quot;):</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                     %s.sink = phi &#91;%st, if.then&#93;, &#91;%se, if.else&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                     &lt;...&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                     store %s.sink, %addr&#95;s</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                     &lt;...&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------- TODO -----------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 1) Generalize to regions other than diamonds</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 2) Be more aggressive merging memory operations</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Note that both changes require register pressure control</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="324"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a6d3231fb84ed4182ec22e9442a87dbf8">BasicBlock::reverse&#95;iterator</a> RBI = Pred0-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a1c2af7a9e501d399f06ca7e10eef46e4">rbegin</a>(), RBE = Pred0-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a9237251072bf6816163abc2d053212ee">rend</a>();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="329"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="330"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Don&#39;t sink non-simple (atomic, volatile) stores.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;S0 = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;StoreInst&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (NStores &#42; Size1 &gt;= MagicCompileTimeControl)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/storeinst">StoreInst</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpulegalizerinfo-cpp/#a22eabd3566ae5f32cb6f594f4f343399">S1</a> = canSinkFromBlock(Pred1, S0)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!canSinkStoresAndGEPs(S0, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpulegalizerinfo-cpp/#a22eabd3566ae5f32cb6f594f4f343399">S1</a>))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Don&#39;t attempt to sink below stores that had to stick around</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// But after removal of a store and some of its feeding</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instruction search again from the beginning since the iterator</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is likely stale at this point.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="346"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SinkBB == TailBB &amp;&amp; TailBB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#ae020673b5ca2bae358005b8980413c4c">hasNPredecessorsOrMore</a>(3)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="347"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We have more than 2 predecessors. Insert a new block</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="350"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!SinkBB)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="351"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
